Package oracle.apps.fnd.applseed.rt.extract.util.taxonomy

Interface Summary
PartitionHelper This interface defines the type and api for handling extract partitioning.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPartitionHelper This is the abstract base class for all PartionHelper implementation classes.
ApplicationIdHelperImpl Implementation class for partitioning by Application Id attribute.
AttributePartitionHelper This class implements PartitionHelper for non-Taxonomy Attributes.
ModuleIdHelperImpl This class is the concrete implementation for TaxonomyAttributeHelper for partitioning by ModuleId attributes.
PartitionHelperFactory This factory class creates PartitionHelper instances based on the links, either ViewLink or LOV, to Appl Taxonomy.
PartitionKeyMap This class holds the map of partition Id to PartitionKey values.
PartitionKeyValue This data class holds information about a taxonomy node, including id value (eg ModuleId or AppId value) user name (user friendly name, eg "Oracle Fusion Human Capital Management") module name (taxomomy module name, eg "HCM") module type (eg APPLICATION or LBA)
PartitionUtil  
SDTaxonomyAttribute  
SDTaxonomyAttributeUtil  
SinglePartitionHelperImpl This concrete class implements the PartitionHelper for cases where there is no partition key, where all extract data should fall under a single partitioned file, defined by the AM product owner name.
TaxonomyPartitionHelper This abstract class handles partitioning using a Taxonomy attribute, currently either ModuleId or ApplicationId.
 

Enum Summary
ModuleType This enum is the wrapper for the Application Taxonomy Module Types.
